name.event: *You have found: A pair of boots
name.description: *A pair of old, leather boots with good soles. You don't want to dwell on how or why they were left here, but they should provide better grip on the mine's uneven floors.
*It's a small and rusted iron rod with a sharp tip. Originally used to create small holes for dynamite charges, you believe it could be better used to make holes in monsters.

*It's a well-used pickaxe. The iron head is scratched and dented in places and the wooden handle is fraying slightly at the ends, but it seems sturdy enough. You doubt it'd survive a few good swings at solid rock, but perhaps you could find another purpose for it.

*A tattered brown-leather coat. It has permanent mineral dust stains all over it and both pockets have holes big enough to put a finger through, but the leather should be able to soften a few blows before it deteriorates further.
*A metal helmet, presumably used by one of the former miners. It's kinda dusty and has a few dents in places, but it'll do.
*It's a rock. It's one of many you have seen, but something about it piqued your interest. It's slightly bigger than some, but a little smaller than others: A perfect size for your hand.
